title: Relational Database
writeup: Interested in the executable? Download here
This was the culminating project for my university CS class on discrete math. Throughout the class we built a scanner, parser, database, and interpreter. The language used was C++

title: Family Map
alt: Screenshot of family map client app
writeup: Currently working on it, check back in January
Developing an Android app in Java for my Advanced Programming Concepts class. It takes a mock set of family history data and populates a map with events such as birth/death, marriage, and others.
